message.body: (01/02) Are you working? I know I'm an unwelcome distraction but Fridays are particularly tough on this end, especially once all my friends have gone their sepa
(02/02) rate ways . I'd like nothing more than to discuss with you what it means to be 20-something. Too far? Maybe. But you know better than anyone.
Better than anyone? I just got out of work and am exhausted. Im sorry I can't discuss
(01/02) I meant to say know me better than anyone. I'm sorry Mattie, I really don't mean to ask you to have convetsations you're not interested in. Just missin
(02/02) g your wisdom in my life, which I realize is probably too much to ask for. Rest your body well

Please don't feel like you're an inconvenience or an annoyance. You're not. I'm still trying to make sense of this and besides I'm just totally out of my mind busy. I haven't talked to pat in a month. So please, just be generous and know that I would talk if I could
(01/03) Thanks for saying that Mattie, and I know, I'm sorry you're so busy and I don't expect that you can talk. If you can and want to I'm very happy to, but
(02/03) I know you've got so many things on your mind. Know that I completely understand and truly just want you to do what you need to do to be good to yoursel
